name: DMT Trip
description:
DMT is a psychoactive molecule that many people who have consumed the drug say the experience transcends the boundaries of language itself. It stands for dimethlytriptamine and it is a key ingredient in the Amazonian shamanic brew ayahuasca. When consumed, DMT fits snuggly into the most wide and important network in the human brain: the serotonin system. If drunk as part of the ayahuasca brew, the experience usually lasts for 4 to 8 hours. If smoked, it’s action is much shorter. It has a peak experience of 3 to 5 minutes and fully back to baseline, or ordinary reality, in 20 to 30 minutes.

DMT is the GOD molecule that allows us to face the code of reality itself.
